headline: Clorox (NYSE:CLX) Exceeds Q2 Expectations
summary: Consumer products giant Clorox (NYSE:CLX) reported revenue ahead of Wall Street’s expectations in Q2 CY2025, with sales up 4.5% year on year to $1.99 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.87 per share was 29.7% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: Clorox (NYSE:CLX) Exceeds Q2 Expectations

headline: Compared to Estimates, Clorox (CLX) Q4 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for Clorox (CLX) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended June 2025, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

headline: Clorox (CLX) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates
summary: Clorox (CLX) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +28.12% and +3.04%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Clorox (CLX) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates

headline: Clorox: Fiscal Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results surpassed Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of eight analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $2.24 per share. The consumer products maker posted revenue of $1.99 billion in the period, also topping Street forecasts.

raw.headline: Clorox: Fiscal Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The results surpassed Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of eight analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $2.24 per share. The consumer products maker posted revenue of $1.99 billion in the period, also topping Street forecasts.

headline: Clorox issues disappointing annual forecasts on bleach maker's system upgrade
summary: Since fiscal year 2022, Clorox has been modernizing its supply chain and improving its inventory management through a five-year digital transformation plan worth up to $580 million, which includes enterprise resource planning (ERP).  Retailers will use their inventory during Clorox's transition period, which will result in lower shipments, the company said.  It warned of an 85 to 95 cents reduction in annual earnings per share.

headline: Clorox Reports Q4 and FY25 Results, Provides FY26 Outlook
summary: The Clorox Company (NYSE: CLX) today reported results for the fourth quarter and fiscal year 2025, which ended June 30, 2025.

headline: 10 Dividend Stocks Poised to Outperform
summary: FEATURE  Looking for stocks with a steady dividend that also offer the prospect of price gains? One place to go bargain hunting is among the so-called dividend aristocrats—stocks with a record of paying and raising dividends for 25 consecutive years.
